title: Chess Game Dataset From Lichess Server
text:
Description
The chess dataset is from the lichess server and has data of over 20,000 matches.

title: Chess Game Dataset From Lichess Server
text:
Player Winning Percent
Most matches are rated matches and White wins about 50% of the time, Black wins about 45% of the time and there is a draw about 5% of the time.


Figure 1

title: Chess Game Dataset From Lichess Server
section: Number of Turns Until Game Finished
text:
Number of Turns Until Game Finished
50% of games end before turn 55. 90% of games end before turn 107.


Figure 2

title: Chess Game Dataset From Lichess Server
text:
Status of Victory
The majority of games end with a player resigning. The second largest result of games is checkmate.


Figure 3

title: Chess Game Dataset From Lichess Server
text:
Openings
Plot of the ten most used openings.


Figure 4

title: Chess Game Dataset From Lichess Server
text:
Player Rating
50% of players have a rating less than 1564. 90% of players have a rating less than 1979.
